title: We are state champion!
preview: After hard work we achieved our first milestone.
text:
That weekend it finally happened. For a long time we had worked for the state championship. Full of anticipation we set up our booth on friday so we could talk about our presentation in the evening. On saturday we took of for Elmshorn really early. After the official welcome the competition started with the presentation of our booth, after that we had our oral presentation and our race. Unfortunately we had a penalty time of 0,1 seconds because of a mistake in our construction. With a time of 1.232 sec we placed fourth anyway. Before the final judgement we lost the knock-out race against the team „de blitzen“.
Our overall result was quite the contrary: We are state champion and got trophies for the best construction, the best portfolio and the best booth.

title: After competition is before the competition
preview: Today we had the racetrack as our guest.
text: Today we used our day off school for the competition. After the state championship we had the racetrack as our guest. We haven´t got a new car, but we thought it would be useful to take a close look at the old models anyway. Therefor we used the light barrier system Hanno built, which already was called into action in the test runs. With it we were able to exactly document the race to gain some further insight. In the next weeks we are going to analyse our results to use them for the construction of our new car.

title: Besuch der FH Kiel
preview: The Fachhochschule Kiel is still our manufacturing partner.
text: Today we visited the Fachhochschule Kiel, our partner. There we talked about the manufacturing of our car for the german championship. Monday they will start the chassis manufacturing, because on sunday is our construction deadline.
